Tetrarch Thifiell:
Palus Knights are teh elite knights of the Dark Elves. Their excellent swordmanship is based on swift, precise attacks and effective defense, and it connot be compared to other races that depent on mere strength or coarser skills.
The most talented of Palus Knights are selected for the highest order, as a Shillien Knight, or become Bladedancers, with almost unearthly skill in swordmanship.
Ask about changing profession to a Palus Knight
